mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_No, board_No, mem_Id, reply_Content) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{memId}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: select r.reply_No, r.board_No, r.mem_Id, r.reply_Content, r.reply_Date, r.reply_Updatedate, m.mem_Nickname, m.mem_Img from reply r, member m where board_No = #{boardNo} and m.mem_Id = r.mem_Id order by reply_No
mapper.update: update reply set reply_Content = #{replyContent}, reply_Updatedate = sysdate where reply_No = #{ReplyNO}
mapper.delete: delete from (select * from reply r , (select * from board where mem_Id=#{memId}) b where r.board_No = b.board_No)
